name: ESP_AT_Lib
keywords: wifi, WebServer, AT-command, wifi-shield, ESP8266, ESP32, Teensy, AVR, SAM DUE, SAMD21, SAMD51, STM32, nRF52, ESP8266-AT, ESP32-AT, rpi-pico, rp2040, raspberry-pi-pico, nano-rp2040-connect, mbed
description: Simple ESP8266/ESP32-AT-command wrapper library for AVR, Teensy, SAM DUE, SAMD21, SAMD51, STM32, nRF52, SIPEED_MAIX_DUINO and RP2040-based (Nano_RP2040_Connect, RASPBERRY_PI_PICO, etc.) boards using ESP8266/ESP32 AT-command shields
